title: Lead Software Engineer
description: As companies first employed Engineer, worked with business stakeholders directly to deliver an alpha product to market.
Managed additional part-time Engineers by coordinating product road map with business needs to help deliver key product features.
Represented product in high level discussions with C-suite employees while working to put the best product forward.
Used Shadcn, Tailwind, React, Redux, Node, Express, and other libraries to completely build out a member onboarding process and dashboard.
Integrated external APIs such as an EMR, Stripe, CustomerIO, and Quest to help facilitate the member journey.

title: Senior Front-End Engineer
description: Spearheaded the integration of all company offerings into a unified 'portal' by leveraging Webpack federated modules, collaborating closely with team members to ensure seamless functionality and user experience.

Demonstrated proficiency in React, Redux, Redux Toolkit, TypeScript, Webpack, Babel, and Sass by actively contributing to repositories on a daily basis, enhancing project efficiency and maintainability.
Played a key role in expanding and maintaining the company's component library, implementing new features and components to enhance usability and consistency across the organization.
Facilitated effective communication and knowledge sharing across multiple teams by crafting comprehensive company documentation, ensuring alignment and understanding among stakeholders.
Successfully integrated TypeScript into multiple repositories, improving codebase robustness and maintainability.
Led various agile ceremonies, including daily stand-ups, ticket refinement, deploy planning, and retrospectives, fostering a collaborative and efficient development environment.
Selected as a 1-on-1 mentor for onboarding new employees and interns, providing guidance and support to facilitate their integration into the company culture and development processes.

title: Front-End Software Engineer
description: Contributed to the development and maintenance of company's front-end applications.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality features.

title: Front-End Engineer
description: Revitalized multiple e-commerce websites, optimizing both paid search and SEO strategies to drive enhanced user engagement and conversion rates.
Directed teams of 3+ members in the successful reconstruction of numerous e-commerce platforms, consistently achieving project milestones and delivery targets.
Provided mentorship to new team members, facilitating their integration into company workflows and processes, thereby fostering a culture of high performance and collaboration.

title: Associate Engineer
description: Developed and maintained e-commerce websites with focus on user experience and performance.

title: Front-End Engineer
description: Crafted and deployed full-stack mobile applications utilizing React Native, from initial design (sketch) to deployment.

title: Teaching Assistant and Development Tutor
description: Mentored students learning web development fundamentals and best practices.
